overview: An all-star crew has assembled on the Isle of Man this year to film IOM TT, which promises to be one of the most beautiful and in-depth looks at one of the deadliest races in the world. An annual event that's taken place for over a century, the TT is a complex road course that spans the majority of its namesake isle, where top-tier superbikes and their riders go all-out â€” often just inches away homes and people. On-board footage from motorcycles in the race can be terrifying enough to make you queasy.  Studio Kippenberger assembles the worlds leading automotive filmmakers to bring us IOM TT.
tagline: A tribute film to all the fallen heros of the Isle of Man TT race since 1907. A look at what drew them to the race and kept them there.
title: IOM TT
